title: Can you make money writing Instagram quotes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on what you are going to with those quotes. Everybody can create quotes and share them on Instagram, but you won’t directly make money from that. You have to commercialize your Instagram page. Most people out there which are doing this are building Instagram pages around a certain niche and try to grow it first. In this way they gain a lot of followers and with those followers they can make money. So sharing quotes on Instagram is just a way to get followers. It’s the content you are creating. Your niche will be quotes but to increase the change to make money in this way you need to do some things: Specific niche || To get engaged followers you need to narrow down. For instance: quotes > motivational quotes > motivational quotes about successStay consistent || People will unfollow you if you stop posting for one week.Don’t try to sell things || You need to add value, don’t try to sell things. If you want to make money with your followers you have to give them the feeling that you give them advice or do a suggestion to them. It has to be free. If people click on the link and are brought to the free thing you gave them, you can suggest things they may also find interesting and which are paid. We call that upselling.Note that there are more ways to make money with your Instagram account. This is just one of them.

Well honestly you can’t make money directly by posting quotes on Instagram. But that would be one of the important element in order to make money online. Normally what entrepreneurs is doing is they post interesting quotes (related to the niche that they’re currently in) and drive the traffic to others platforms where they’re selling their stuff. Of course you can’t put any link in you ig post but you can do that on your bio. So the real deal is on your other platform such as blog, youtube channel, fb page and so on.
